titleStmt.title: Joannes Chrysostomus, In Epistulam I ad Corinthios

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: change in Biblio 95693 to 95692; record in Display Name: Joannes Chrysostomus, In Epistulam I ad Corinthios; delete Legacy Display. The text looks fine.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: change in Biblio 95693 to 95692; record in Display Name: Joannes Chrysostomus, In Epistulam I ad Corinthios; delete Legacy Display. The text looks fine.

Submit - Encoded Greek text from BKT 9.15, as part of Heidelbergs Digital Webinar Summer 2020. Recto Fr.1lin1: not sure whether christian symbol should be read as a christogram (*chi-rho*); lin6: no underdot τες (from photo); lin8: no underdot διαβάντα (from photo). Fr.2 lin2: added <τῶν>, so Joh.Chr., is in lacuna, so no varia lectio, but ‘forgotten’ by Ioannides? lin6: encoded {οὐ}, before lin7 [ο]ὔ̣[τ]ε̣; lin7-8: encoded κατα 8.- [σκευῆς] (BKT has κατα 8.- [κατασκευῆς], typo in lacuna; lin8: encoded {οὐ}; Verso fr.2 lin9: added [.?]; lin11: added [.?]

Submit - Encoded Greek text from BKT 9.15, as part of Heidelbergs Digital Webinar Summer 2020. Recto Fr.1lin1: not sure whether christian symbol should be read as a christogram (*chi-rho*); lin6: no underdot τες (from photo); lin8: no underdot διαβάντα (from photo). Fr.2 lin2: added <τῶν>, so Joh.Chr., is in lacuna, so no varia lectio, but ‘forgotten’ by Ioannides? lin6: encoded {οὐ}, before lin7 [ο]ὔ̣[τ]ε̣; lin7-8: encoded κατα 8.- [σκευῆς] (BKT has κατα 8.- [κατασκευῆς], typo in lacuna; lin8: encoded {οὐ}; Verso fr.2 lin9: added [.?]; lin11: added [.?]
